cause.description:
This cause exists for one purpose only. It is the burger's tech savy cry for help.
so help us find a begum!
1. khoobsurat ho
2. achay baal hon, ya sar par baal hon
3. aur aur khoobsurat ho
cause.mission: to serve our nation in its finest hour by giving our vaaldain a bahoo.
cause.name: Find Me A Begum!
